txt.en: 'Before you venture back out, [placeholder] visit Captain-General Tordúr. He offers rewards for those willing to fight in this harsh land.'

'[placeholder], it is good that you have come. The land beyond the stairs of Glán Vraig teems with enemies. We must remain diligent in our battle against them lest they breach our walls and ravage the civilized lands.\n\n'If you wish to earn armaments commissioned for the defenders of these lands, take this and meet the enemies on the field of battle. Your efforts will not go unrewarded.'

The battle in the Ettenmoors is endless. Captain-General Tordúr bids all speak with him before venturing into the badlands beyond the safety of Glán Vraig. There are rewards to be had for the battles ahead.
